眛字的基本解释

眛
mèi
目不明。
昏昧；不明事理。

眛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mèi］
［《廣韻》莫佩切，去隊，明。］
(1)目不明。
(2)昏昧；懵懂无知。

眛字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【目字部】　眛； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页804第13
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?莫佩切，音妹。【說文】目不明也。【廣韻】目暗也。【左傳·僖二十四年】目不別五色之章爲眛。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?莫貝切，音沬。義同。

眛字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
眛字的起名意思

暂无。

unobservant
Basic explanation of words
unobservant
mèi
Unknown.
Ignorant; unreasonable.
unobservant
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mèi］
["Guangyun" Mo Peche, go to the team, Ming. ]
(1) The item is unknown.
(2) Ignorant; ignorant and ignorant.
unobservant

【Lunch】【Headword Department】　ying; Kangxi strokes: 10; Page number: page 804 13
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Mo Peiqie, Yin Mei. [Said the text] The head is unknown. [Guang Yun] My eyes are dark. [Twenty-four years of Zuo Zhuan] The five-color chapter is not the same.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Mo Beiqie, Yin Chu. The same meaning.
